clearSessionHint: Remove the cached secret key from the session.
mismatch: The entered secret key does not match the loaded public key.
cleared: Secret key deleted from the session
label: Enter the source secret key (S-Key)

remember.label: Remember the secret key for this session
remember.hint: When enabled, the key will be stored until the tab is closed and reused for further payments.

multipleSignersInfo: This action requires multiple signatures. Please provide enough secret keys to meet the threshold.

multisigOptions.title: Signature options for this multisig account

distributed.title: Standard: Distributed Multisig Flow
distributed.body: By default, this session signs only with your own private key. Additional signatures are added via exported XDR files or a job ID from other signers.

localAll.title: Enter all signatures locally.
localAll.body: Choose this option only if you control all the secret keys associated with this account (z. B. nach einer Kontorettung mit mehreren Signern). The Stellar Account Manager will then gather all the signatures locally and send the transaction directly to Horizon.
localAll.checkboxLabel: Enter all signatures in this dialog locally and send them directly.
localAll.warning: Note: If you enter all signatures locally, all secret keys will be present in this session. Use this option only on trusted devices.

summary.single: This account uses a single signature.
